verses.text: TOKUA ‘i hono ua ta‘u ‘o Kingi Talaiasi, ‘i hono māhina ono, mo e ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e māhina, na‘e ai ha folofola ‘a Sihova na‘e fakafai ‘i he palōfita ko Hākeai kia Seluipepeli foha ‘a Saletili, ko e kōvana ‘o Siuta, pea kia Siosiua foha ‘o Siosateki, ko e taula‘eiki lahi, ke fakahā:
Ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti, Tokua ‘oku lau ‘e he kakai na, Kuo te‘eki taimi ke mau ‘alu atu, ‘a e taimi ke langa ‘a e fale ‘o Sihova.
Ko ia, na‘e hoko ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova, ‘o fakafai ‘i he palōfita ko Hākeai, ‘o pehē,
Sā! kuo taimi ‘apē ke mou nofo ‘i he ngaahi fale kuo ‘aofi, kae tuku lusa ‘a e fale ni!
Pea ko eni, ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti, ‘Ai homou loto ke sivi homou ngaahi ‘alunga.

Na‘a mou tō ta‘u ke lahi, ka mou utu mai ha momo‘i me‘a; ‘oku mou kai, kae ‘ikai mākona; ‘oku mou inu, kae ‘ikai topono; ‘eku mou ‘ai kofu, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou māfana; pea ko ia ‘oku nō ngāue ko ‘ene tali totongi ke ‘ai ki he kato ava.
Ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti, ‘Ai homou loto ke sivi homou ngaahi ‘alunga.
‘Alu ki he mo‘unga, ‘o fetuku ‘akau mai, pea langa ‘a e fale; pea te u lata ai, pea te u fakalāngilangi‘i au–ko Sihova ia.

Ko ho‘omou ‘amanaki na‘e sio ki ha me‘a lahi, kae uoke ko e momo‘i me‘a; pea ‘i ho‘omou fetuku mai ki ‘api, na‘a ku ifi‘i. Koe‘uhi ko e hā?–Ko Sihova Sāpaoti ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai–koe‘uhi ko hoku fale, he kuo tuku lusa, ka ko kimoutolu ‘oku lele leva takitaha ki hono fale ‘o‘ona.
Ko hono ‘uhinga ia kuo ta‘ofi ai ‘e he langi ‘a e hahau, ko homou tautea, pea kuo ta‘ofi ‘e he kelekele hono fua.

Pea u ui mai ha lusa ki he fonua, pea ki he ngaahi mo‘unga, pea ki he uite, pea ki he uaine fo‘ou, pea ki he lolo; ‘io, ki he me‘a fua pē ‘oku tupu mei he kelekele, pea ki he tangata, pea ki he manu, pea ki he fita‘a kotoa pē ‘a e nima.

Pea ko Seluipepeli foha ‘o Saletili, pea mo Siosiua foha ‘o Siosateki, ko e taula‘eiki lahi, mo si‘i toenga kakai kotoa, na‘a nau talangofua ki he le‘o ‘o Sihova ko honau ‘Otua, pea ki he ngaahi lea ‘a Hākeai ko e palōfita, ‘o taau mo hono fekau ‘e Sihova ko honau ‘Otua; pea na‘e ‘apasia ‘a e kakai ko ‘enau ongo‘i ‘a Sihova.
Toki lea ‘a Hākeai ko e talafekau ‘a Sihova ‘i he‘ene fai ‘a e fekau ‘a Sihova ki he kakai, ‘o ne pehē, Ko Sihova eni mei he Ta‘ehāmai–‘Oku ou ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e au.

Pea na‘e ue‘i ‘e Sihova ‘a e laumālie ‘o Seluipepeli foha ‘o Saleteli, ko e kōvana ‘o Siuta, mo e laumālie ‘o Siosiua foha ‘o Sihosataki, ko e taula‘eiki lahi, mo e laumālie ‘o e toenga kakai kotoa; pea na‘a nau omi ‘o fai ngāue ‘i he fale ‘o Sihova Sāpaoti ko honau ‘Otua,
‘i hono ‘aho uofulu mā fā, ‘i hono ono ‘o e māhina, ‘i hono ta‘u ua ‘o Kingi Talaiasi.
